section.title: Add Tabbed Navigation
section.para: Open the file /exercises/index.html in your browser. Use the file /exercises/js/tabs.js. Your task is to create tabbed navigation for the two div.module elements. To accomplish this:

listitem.para: Create an unordered list element before the first module.
Iterate over the modules using $.fn.each. For each module, use the text of the h2 element as the text for a list item that you add to the unordered list element.
Bind a click even to the list item that:
Shows the related module, and hides any other modules
Adds a class of "current" to the clicked list item
Removes the class "current" from the other list item
